data.title: Solange Knowles And Alan Ferguson Wedding: 5 Details About The Couple's Secret Marriage Ceremony
data.meta_description: After dating for several years, Solange Knowles is preparing to walk down the aisle with her longtime boyfriend Alan Ferguson.
data.text:
After close to two years of dating, Solange Knowles and her boyfriend Alan Ferguson are preparing to tie the knot!

Much like her sister Beyoncé’s wedding to rapper Jay Z and best friend Kelly Rowland’s wedding to Tim Witherspoon, Knowles is reportedly planning to wed in a secret ceremony this weekend, reports US Weekly. And here’s all that we know so far about the adorable couple’s upcoming ceremony…

The couple relocated to the state from New York City during the summer of 2013. They made the move with Knowles’ 10-year-old son Julez, who is her child with her ex-husband Daniel Smith.

VIDEO: Watch Beyoncé, Jay Z And Blue Ivy Dance And Party At NYC’s Halloween Parade

In an interview with Harper’s Bazaar back in March, Knowles raved about her relationship with Ferguson and why he’s adding an extra challenge to her music career.

“Luckily, I dated all of the losers ages ago. My love life has been stable for a while,” she said. “It’s a f–ked-up thing — without conflict it’s a lot harder to write interesting songs.”
